profile.title: User Profile.
profile.description: Select a user profile to you want home assistant to access.

auth.title: Authenticate Withings
auth.description: Follow the link below and Authorize access to your Withings account. Be certain to select the {profile} profile. [Authorize Link]({authorization_url})

create_entry.default: Successfully authenticated with Withings for the selected profile.

errors.follow_link: Please follow the link and authenticate before pressing Submit.

abort.no_flows: You need to configure Withings before authenticating with it.
abort.api_no_data: No data provided to Withings callback.
abort.api_no_profile_data: Profile was not provided with code.
